sentences.en: After a Hodgkin's disease scare , Allen quit the company.
sentences.cn: 阿伦在身患淋巴肉芽肿病后退出了公司.

sentences.en: An all-star game might scare up a little interest.
sentences.cn: 一场全明星比赛可能勉强会激起一点点兴趣。

sentences.en: Did people still tell their kids imbecilic scare stories about bogey policewomen?
sentences.cn: 人们还在给他们的孩子们讲那些恐怖女警察吓唬人的弱智故事吗？

sentences.en: Don't let the noise scare you; it's only the wind.
sentences.cn: 别让那声音把你吓住, 那不过是风声罢了.

sentences.en: Don't you realize what a scare you've given us all?
sentences.cn: 你难道不知道你把我们大家都吓得不轻吗？

sentences.en: for a price, the box office can usually scare up a pair of tickets.
sentences.cn: 只要花点钱，售票处常能弄到几张票。

sentences.en: He described talk of sackings as scare stories.
sentences.cn: 他说人们谈起解雇犹如在讲恐怖故事。

sentences.en: I don’t scare easily, you know.
sentences.cn: 你知道我不是那么容易给吓倒的！

sentences.en: I like reading scare stories.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢读恐怖故事.

sentences.en: If you make a noise, you'll scare off the animals.
sentences.cn: 如果你弄出声响就会把动物吓跑.

sentences.en: Last night we all had a needless scare. "
sentences.cn: 大家空受了一晚上的虚惊. ”

sentences.en: Loud noises can scare animals or birds.
sentences.cn: 噪声太大会惊吓到鸟兽。

sentences.en: managed to scare up some folding chairs for the unexpected crowd.
sentences.cn: 设法为突然出现的人群找到一些折椅

sentences.en: The huntsman sent a beater ahead to scare out the partridge.
sentences.cn: 猎人派一名赶猎助手上前把鹧鸪从隐蔽处赶出来.

sentences.en: There's been quite a scare about the possible side effects of this new drug.
sentences.cn: 这种新药可能产生的副作用造成了相当大的恐慌.

sentences.en: Those years at school weren't spent in vain. I didn't scare easily.
sentences.cn: 在小学里念了几年书,到底是没白念,他唬不住我.

sentences.en: True, the drought is serious, but it can't scare us.
sentences.cn: 旱情诚然是严重的, 但它吓不倒我们.

sentences.en: We got a bit of a scare.
sentences.cn: 我们受了点惊吓。

sentences.en: Why don't you see if you can scare up a cup of coffee?
sentences.cn: 你看看能不能好歹沏一杯咖啡？

sentences.en: You really gave us a scare !
sentences.cn: 你真的吓了我们一跳！
